resources.string: \nLet your app shine through with material darkness

Pitched Apps is proud to present %s, material design's first and longest lasting theme! Running since Lollipop, and still going with Nougat. 
Made by 1 themer 
Tweaked for 1 500+ hours 
Used by 60 000+ users 

Press the FAB to apply!
Joining beta means much more frequent releases, at the expense that some of them may not be so great. However, being a beta tester and reporting issues is a key part in what makes this theme great.
